titles.title: Youth Prison Reduction through Opportunities, Mentoring, Intervention, Support, and Education Act
Youth PROMISE Act
City Youth Violence Recovery Act
Mynisha's Law
PRECAUTION Act
Prevention Resources for Eliminating Criminal Activity Using Tailored Interventions in Our Neighborhoods Act of 2009

A bill to provide for evidence-based and promising practices related to juvenile delinquency and criminal street gang activity prevention and intervention to help build individual, family, and community strength and resiliency to ensure that youth lead productive, safe, health, gang-free, and law-abiding lives.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
